author: @sole24ore
title: Israel threatens attack on Iran, US reduces personnel in Middle East. And the Knesset saves Netanyahu - Il Sole 24 ORE
text: The United States would be "on the alert" for a "possible" Israeli attack against Iran . The Washington Post writes this, explaining that certain moves made by the US in the region, starting with the go-ahead for the evacuation of unnecessary personnel from the embassy in Baghdad, should be read in this light. The American newspaper explains that American intelligence would be 'increasingly concerned' that Israel might decide to strike Iranian nuclear sites even without Washington's consent.
topics: War, Conflict and Unrest->international military intervention
